long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optimise BP - Browser Extension. This extension allows the user of Optimise BP to interact with the currently active patient within the Clinician User Interface and share that current Pt ID so that background WebAPI calls understand that context of which patient is being viewed via the web browser.
